trans-unit.source: Represents XML data stored in or retrieved from a server.
trans-unit.target: Representerer XML-data som er lagret i eller hentet fra en server.

trans-unit.source: This class contains an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-derived type, and adds SQL-specific features such as database-style null semantics by implementing the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen inneholder en forekomst av en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-avledet type, og legger til SQL-spesifikke funksjoner som null semantikk for database-stil ved å implementere den <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: When you use SqlXml, the XML value that you assign to the SqlXml instance must be consumable by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker SqlXml, må XML-verdien som du tilordner SqlXml forekomsten være forbrukes av en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: For unicode data, the Byte Order Mark (`BOM`) must be present in the stream of data.
trans-unit.target: Unicode-data, den byterekkefølgen (`BOM`) må ligge i dataflyten for dataene.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance, supplying the XML value from the supplied <xref:System.IO.Stream>-derived instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> forekomsten, oppgir XML-verdi fra den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>-avledet forekomsten.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>-derived instance (such as <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>) from which to load the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance's Xml content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>-avledet forekomsten (eksempel <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"> </xref>) som skal lastes inn fra den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> forekomstens Xml-innholdet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance and associates it with the content of the supplied <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> serverforekomsten og knyttes til innholdet i den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If this value is null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the instance is set so that <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne verdien er null (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), forekomsten er angitt slik at <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-derived class instance to be used as the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-avledet klasseforekomsten som skal brukes som verdien for den nye <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the XML content of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> as a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien i XML-innholdet for dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> som <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance was initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), this method returns null.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>forekomsten ble initialisert null (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), denne metoden returnerer null.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-derived instance that contains the XML content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-avledet forekomsten som inneholder XML-innholdet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The actual type may vary (for example, the return value might be <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTextReader"></xref>) depending on how the information is represented internally, on the server.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske typen kan variere (for eksempel returverdien kanskje <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTextReader"> </xref>) avhengig av hvordan informasjonen representeres internt på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Attempt was made to access this property on a null instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det ble gjort forsøk på å få tilgang til denne egenskapen på en null-forekomst av <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer datadefinisjonsspråk for XML-skjema (XSD) for den angitte <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir XSD for det angitte <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance represents a null <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Angir om denne forekomsten representerer en null <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is null.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is null.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents a null instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en null-forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: A null instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: En null-forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method and consumed by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>som beskriver XML-representasjon av objektet som er generert av den <> </> *> metoden og forbrukes av den <> </> *> metode.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>

trans-unit.source: An XmlReader.
trans-unit.target: En XmlReader.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>

trans-unit.source: An XmlWriter
trans-unit.target: En XmlWriter

trans-unit.source: Gets the string representation of the XML content of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter strengrepresentasjon av XML-innholdet for dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the content represented as an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, call the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml.CreateReader%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ikke hente innholdet som er representert som en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, kalle den <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml.CreateReader%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml.CreateReader%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the XML content.
trans-unit.target: Strengrepresentasjon av XML-innholdet.
